skills.name: The Can's Trials
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target.

skills.name: The Can's Tribulations
skills.desc: Increases this unit's ATK. This effect is stackable and unremoveable.

skills.name: The Can's Creed
skills.desc: When this unit is Weakness Broken, it will leave the battle. When attacked, Weaknesses corresponding to the attack's Type will be implanted, up to 2 Weaknesses.
